lines.text: You were a pretty little thing. Not that looks are important - not even for a woman. You don't look at the mantelpiece when you poke the fire.

[to unresponsive audience]
Don't clap too loudly, it's a very old building.
Look at these eyes. I'm dead - behind these eyes. I'm dead.
Old Archie isn't going to get his oats after all.
Cheer up love, life isn't as bad as all that, and even if it is, there's nothing we can do about it.
